Bash("C:/works/miso_robot_ai/NeuroFlow/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import importlib.util, pathlib
spec = importlib.util.find_spec\(''nvidia.cublas''\)
if spec:
    pkg_dir = pathlib.Path\(spec.submodule_search_locations[0]\)
    print\(''cublas dir:'', pkg_dir\)
    for f in pkg_dir.rglob\(''*.dll''\):
        print\('' '', f\)
else:
    print\(''nvidia.cublas not found''\)
")

Bash("C:/works/miso_robot_ai/NeuroFlow/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\)
from voiceFlow.processors.whisper_asr import WhisperAsrProcessor
import numpy as np

proc = WhisperAsrProcessor\(model_size=''tiny'', device=''cuda'', compute_type=''float16''\)

# 1kHz 사인파 3초 \(무음이 아닌 테스트 데이터\)
t = np.linspace\(0, 3, 16000*3, dtype=np.float32\)
audio = \(np.sin\(2 * np.pi * 440 * t\) * 0.3\).astype\(np.float32\)

result = proc.process\(audio, samplerate=16000, seq=1, source_id=''test''\)
if result:
    print\(f''Text: {result.text}''\)
    print\(f''Lang: {result.language}''\)
    print\(f''Segments: {len\(result.segments\)}''\)
else:
    print\(''No speech detected \(expected for sine wave\)''\)
proc.close\(\)
print\(''DONE''\)
")

Bash("C:/works/miso_robot_ai/NeuroFlow/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\)
from voiceFlow.processors.whisper_asr import WhisperAsrProcessor
import numpy as np

proc = WhisperAsrProcessor\(model_size=''large-v3'', device=''cuda'', compute_type=''float16''\)

# 테스트: 사인파
t = np.linspace\(0, 3, 16000*3, dtype=np.float32\)
audio = \(np.sin\(2 * np.pi * 440 * t\) * 0.3\).astype\(np.float32\)

result = proc.process\(audio, samplerate=16000, seq=1, source_id=''test''\)
if result:
    print\(f''Text: {result.text}''\)
else:
    print\(''No speech \(OK for sine wave\)''\)
proc.close\(\)
print\(''large-v3 CUDA OK''\)
")
